link.script: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Organization", "name": "Miks Soft", "alternateName": "miks-soft.com", "url": "https://miks-soft.com", "logo": "https://miks-soft.com/assets/images/logo.svg", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "addressLocality": "Harju maakond, Tallinn,", "postalCode": "11316", "streetAddress": "Kristiine linnaosa, A. H. Tammsaare tee 47" }, "email": "hello@miks-soft.com", "telephone": "+3726347351", "sameAs": [ ] }

div.p: This page can't be found. Please check the link used or click back to the homepage.
Fill out the form below and we`ll get back to you shortly.

input.name: email
input.data-pristine-email-message: Enter a valid email. Example: my-email@gmail.com
input.label: Email*

input.placeholder: A few words about your project, preferred contact method, or other details
input.name: message
input.label: A few words about your project, preferred contact method, or other details

input.name: is_checked
input.label: Yes, I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy

p.data-notification-success: Message has been sent. Weâ€™ll contact you soon.

div.p: We use cookies on our website. You can read more in our Privacy Policy
Cookies necessary for the correct operation of the site are always enabled
